data.name: AndItem
data.value: Logic: Combine profiles with AND

data.value: Count As: Must be equal to given value

data.value: Count As: Must not be equal to given value

data.name: ExceptItem
data.value: Logic: Exclude profiles

data.name: HasAspectRatioItem
data.value: Video Format: Aspect Ratio must be set (true = must, false = must not)
